name: Slice of Screen
description:
My entry for Ludum Dare 41.

The theme was to combine two incompatible genres. I chose 2D Platformer and First Person Shooter. The result might not be a very fun game but I think it's an interesting experience.

In the game you can press Escape to bring up a menu.

When playing the web version, please ignore the 'Quit' buttons. They do nothing.
